p: HWW contains variety of harmful materials including pharmaceuticals and pathogens. HWW is normally treated with sewage wastewater together, although it is not allowed. However, WWTPs are not designed for treating HWW. Pharmaceuticals and pathogens will be then discharged to the receiving water bodies. Antibiotic as one of the most common pollutant in the HWW can cause the development of ARGs. Therefore pharmaceuticals, pathogens, and ARGs have become the three most important contaminants in the HWW. These pollutants can cause server problems to the environment, microorganism, organism, and humans.
